casebody.data:
John T. Hurley et al., Genevieve Knortz, Respondents, v George Okrent et al., Defendants, and Upjohn Company, Appellant. (Appeal No. 1.) [714 NYS2d 924]

—Appeal unanimously dismissed without costs (see, Loafin’ Tree Rest, v Pardi [appeal No. 1], 162 AD2d 985). (Appeal from Order of Supreme Court, Monroe County, Kehoe, J. — Summary Judgment.) Present— Pigott, Jr., P. J., Hayes, Wisner, Scudder and Balio, JJ.
